markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Urbel](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1605)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 29

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Urbel](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1605)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=69" />
<trait label="Gremlin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=221" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 55</row>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +7, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** -1

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
pouch with 4 gold teeth worth 3 gp each, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [pick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=34)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 68

**Weaknesses**
[cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 4

**Kneecapper** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A Medium creature within Urbel's reach leaves a square during its [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) action; **Effect** Urbel lashes out at the triggering creature's knees. He attempts an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check against the creature's Reflex DC. On a success, the target falls and lands [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_pick_ +14 ([fatal d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 2d6+5 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +14 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 slashing

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 21, attack +13
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229)
- **1st**
[Grease](/Spells.aspx?ID=140), [Shocking Grasp](/Spells.aspx?ID=283)
- **2nd**
[Shatter](/Spells.aspx?ID=279)

**Bully**   Any melee weapon Urbel uses gains the [shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193) trait, and if he rolls a critical failure when attempting to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) a creature with the weapon, he treats the result as a failure instead.

**Pound Down**   Urbel's melee Strikes deal an additional 1d6 damage to [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) targets.

</column>
name: Urbel

On a success, the target falls and lands prone. --- Speed 30 feet, climb 20 feet Melee Single Action pick +14 (fatal d10, Shove), Damage 2d6+5 piercing Melee Single Action jaws +14 (Finesse), Damage 1d6+5 piercing plus Grab Melee Single Action claw +14 (Agile, Finesse), Damage 1d4+5 slashing Primal Innate Spells DC 21, attack +13 - Cantrips (2nd) Prestidigitation - 1st Grease, Shocking Grasp - 2nd Shatter Bully Any melee weapon Urbel uses gains the shove trait, and if he rolls a critical failure when attempting to Shove a creature with the weapon, he treats the result as a failure instead.
